entry.content:
Window Functions trong SQL - Ph√¢n t√≠ch d·ªØ li·ªáu n√¢ng cao

Window Functions (ROW_NUMBER, RANK, SUM OVER) gi√∫p ph√¢n t√≠ch d·ªØ li·ªáu m√† kh√¥ng c·∫ßn group by, r·∫•t h·ªØu √≠ch cho b√°o c√°o b√£i xe.

1. X·∫øp h·∫°ng xe ƒë·ªó l√¢u nh·∫•t (RANK)

SELECT 
    bien_so,
    thoi_gian_vao,
    thoi_gian_ra,
    RANK() OVER (ORDER BY (thoi_gian_ra - thoi_gian_vao) DESC) AS xep_hang
FROM Ve
WHERE thoi_gian_ra IS NOT NULL;

2. T√≠nh t·ªïng doanh thu theo ng√†y (SUM OVER)

SELECT 
    ngay,
    doanh_thu,
    SUM(doanh_thu) OVER (ORDER BY ngay) AS tong_doanh_thu_tich_luy
FROM BaoCaoDoanhThu;

Window Functions gi√∫p b√°o c√°o linh ho·∫°t m√† kh√¥ng c·∫ßn subquery ph·ª©c t·∫°p.

entry.content:
T·ªëi ∆∞u h√≥a truy v·∫•n SQL - Index v√† Query Tuning

Khi database l·ªõn (h√†ng tri·ªáu b·∫£n ghi), truy v·∫•n ch·∫≠m l√† v·∫•n ƒë·ªÅ l·ªõn. Index v√† t·ªëi ∆∞u h√≥a query gi√∫p tƒÉng t·ªëc ƒë√°ng k·ªÉ.

1. T·∫°o Index cho c·ªôt th∆∞·ªùng xuy√™n t√¨m ki·∫øm

CREATE INDEX idx_thoi_gian_vao ON Ve(thoi_gian_vao);

2. S·ª≠ d·ª•ng EXPLAIN ƒë·ªÉ ph√¢n t√≠ch query

entry.content:
Truy v·∫•n SQL n√¢ng cao - JOIN v√† Subquery

Trong h·ªá th·ªëng qu·∫£n l√Ω b√£i xe, ch√∫ng ta c·∫ßn k·∫øt h·ª£p d·ªØ li·ªáu t·ª´ nhi·ªÅu b·∫£ng (xe v√†o/ra, v√©, kh√°ch h√†ng) ƒë·ªÉ t·∫°o b√°o c√°o. JOIN v√† Subquery l√† hai k·ªπ thu·∫≠t m·∫°nh m·∫Ω gi√∫p x·ª≠ l√Ω ƒëi·ªÅu n√†y hi·ªáu qu·∫£.

1. INNER JOIN - K·∫øt h·ª£p b·∫£ng Xe v√† V√©

L·∫•y danh s√°ch xe ƒë√£ v√†o b√£i v√† v√© t∆∞∆°ng ·ª©ng.

SELECT x.bien_so, v.thoi_gian_vao, v.thoi_gian_ra
FROM Xe x
INNER JOIN Ve v ON x.id = v.xe_id
WHERE v.thoi_gian_ra IS NOT NULL;

2. Subquery - T√¨m xe ƒë·ªó l√¢u nh·∫•t

S·ª≠ d·ª•ng Subquery ƒë·ªÉ t√¨m xe c√≥ th·ªùi gian ƒë·ªó l√¢u nh·∫•t.

SELECT bien_so, thoi_gian_vao, thoi_gian_ra
FROM Xe x
JOIN Ve v ON x.id = v.xe_id
WHERE (v.thoi_gian_ra - v.thoi_gian_vao) = (
    SELECT MAX(thoi_gian_ra - thoi_gian_vao)
    FROM Ve
    WHERE thoi_gian_ra IS NOT NULL
);

C·∫£m ∆°n b·∫°n ƒë√£ theo d√µi! N·∫øu b·∫°n th·∫•y h·ªØu √≠ch, h√£y th·ª≠ √°p d·ª•ng JOIN/Subquery v√†o database c·ªßa m√¨nh nh√©.

üì¶ Async/Await Example - Fetch Parking Stats
async function getParkingStats() {
    try {
        // G·ªçi API l·∫•y d·ªØ li·ªáu th·ª±c t·∫ø t·ª´ m√°y ch·ªß
